TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExceptionForSave extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Office2013.Drawing.Chart.BooleanType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2013 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is c15:xForSave.

remarks.format:
## Remarks *2.3.57 xForSave*
*Target namespace:* http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2012/chart
The *xForSave* element is a *CT_Boolean* (section 2.5.80) element\<117> that specifies whether this *Datalabel* (section 2.2.1.3) was created solely for the purpose of saving. If it is true, it means that when the file is loaded back this *Datalabel* will be merged with the default *Datalabel* on that chart series ([ISO/IEC-29500-1] section 21.2).
The following W3C XML Schema ([XMLSCHEMA1] section 2.1) fragment specifies the contents of this element.
*\<xsd:element name="xForSave" type="c:CT_Boolean"/>*
See section 5.13 for the full W3C XML Schema ([XMLSCHEMA1] section 2.1).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ExceptionForSave class.
